sentences.sContent: Should I not be worrying about Pakistan?
sentences.sCn: 我不该担心巴基斯坦问题吗？

sentences.sContent: I mean you presumably still have friends and family back in Pakistan.
sentences.sCn: 我的意思是你大概还有朋友和家人在巴基斯坦吧。

sentences.sContent: We can see the impacts of those problems on Afghanistan and Pakistan.
sentences.sCn: 我们能够看到那些问题对阿富汗和巴基斯坦的影响。
